name: Space Wars (itch) (Rrodneston)
description:
Key Features:

  • 2 Enemy types, one that shoots and one that zooms
  • Many stars
  • Some cool music that I found online! 
  • A small blue ship (that’s you!)
  • 4 different planets that you can see every few seconds
  • Possible future updates to improve and expand upon the basics you see here.

This is my first project and it was made in the Unity Engine.  I may come back to this project in the future to add some features that I didn't have time to add for the deadline. 

 Contact information: rodneyrodneston@gmail.com

Personal/company bio: Rrodneston Games is a small independent company started by “Rodney Rodneston” in 2020. Our first published game “Space Wars” an endless arcade shooter was created for a school project and was “Rodney’s” first attempt at creating a game. As time goes on we hope to learn to produce better, more interesting games.
